name: Body of Time
description:
Oh, someone’s on the page! Will you help me? I need someone to fix this clock. It’s simple, just travel through four different eras of time and collect the scattered clock pieces I’ve left lying about. You might run into anomalies along the way that you’ll need to fix, but I’m sure the mental challenge will be no match for someone as capable as yourself. And I’m certain you can handle the odd enemy or two? No… they’ll surely kill you, but you can always hide. I’ll be there to keep you company of course, whatever you need, you can count on me. Just download the game and we may begin!

This game is a third year college project made by 6 students from Media Design School in 2022.

Recommended PG-13. Content includes mild depictions of bodily organs.

This game supports both Windows and Mac OS. You'll be able to use a mouse and keyboard to interact with my world.  

RELLIK Studios Team members:

Programmers

  • Himanshu Chawla ( https://himchawla43.itch.io/ )
  • Rachael Colaco 

Artists

  • Rine ( https://artificialorange.itch.io/ )
  • Jack Kam ( https://jackk-0234.itch.io/ )
  • Nicholas Matthews 
  • Yufei Bian

I hope to see you around in time.
